page.title: 06EVENTS 1 BRAE
page.content: THE OIL AND WHAT IT DID TO OUR AREA. The most important event in the past few years was the construction and the development of Sullom Voe Oil Terminal.Although the terminal is outside our area it has meant a great change in our environment and life. A whole new housing estate was built in Brae to house people moving into the area to work at Sullom Voe.People have come into our area from all over Shetland and other parts of the country.This has meant a rise in population and school roles.New roads have been built to deal with the increase in traffic through our area. There has been a rise in the standard of living,with both incomers and locals earning large wages at the terminal.Two new schools have been built to deal with the rise in school roles.
